posts.post_title: FT - 4 Old Judge N172 Browns Champs (SGC)
posts.post_content:
I have the following SGC graded N172 Browns Champs available.

 - Nat Hudson SGC 3
 - Yank Robinson SGC 4
 - Will Gleason SGC 2
 - Doc Bushong SGC 2

I’m looking for PSA graded N172s that I need.
